summary:
The 'DevSecOps Engineers' program offered by the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security at Bar-Ilan University is a comprehensive training course designed to prepare professionals for the growing field of DevOps with a specialization in cybersecurity and cloud technologies. The program is structured to provide students with the skills and certifications needed to excel in the industry, including LPIC-1: Linux Administrator, AWS Cloud Practitioner, and ISC2 CCSP certifications. The course spans approximately 10 months and includes 350 academic hours of instruction, combining theoretical knowledge with practical projects.

The curriculum covers a wide range of topics, including Linux administration, Python programming, Git and GitHub, Bash scripting, virtualization and containers (Docker), Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, AWS cloud infrastructure, Terraform, monitoring and alerting systems (ELK Stack, Grafana, Prometheus), and cloud security (ISC2 CCSP). Students will also develop professional skills such as creating LinkedIn profiles, preparing for job interviews, and presenting final projects that integrate all learned skills.

The program emphasizes hands-on learning, with students working on real-world scenarios and using original materials from AWS and ISC2. Participants gain access to AWS accounts for practical exercises and receive vouchers for discounted international certification exams. Graduates of the program are equipped to pursue careers in both DevOps and DevSecOps roles, with a strong foundation in cybersecurity and cloud technologies. The course is taught by experienced instructors with extensive industry backgrounds, ensuring high-quality education and professional guidance.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: DevSecOps Engineers - The Complete Program for Training DevOps Experts with Specialization in Cyber and Cloud Technologies.

COURSE OVERVIEW: This program, offered by Bar-Ilan University's School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, is the most comprehensive and advanced training program in Israel for DevSecOps experts. It integrates DevOps processes with security aspects, preparing students for the dynamic and challenging job market. The program addresses the growing demand for DevOps professionals, with a 75% increase in job openings and a 50% rise in LinkedIn mentions over the past two years. The course emphasizes collaboration between development and IT processes, efficient automation, and integrating security measures from the beginning of the development lifecycle.

TARGET AUDIENCE: The program is designed for IT professionals, software testers, programmers, and graduates of engineering and exact sciences degrees.

COURSE LEADERSHIP: 
- Program Manager: Mr. Eran Shacham, Director of the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security at Bar-Ilan University, with over 30 years of experience in cybersecurity and IT training.
- Professional Advisor: Mr. Gidi Farkash, President of the Israeli Chapter of ISC2, with extensive experience in cybersecurity and cloud solutions.
- Senior Lecturer: Mr. Yuval Shaul, a DevOps expert with 25 years of teaching experience and a degree in Software Engineering from Ben-Gurion University.

PREREQUISITES: 
- Background in IT, software testing, or programming.
- Graduates of engineering or exact sciences degrees.
- Admission interview with the program advisor.
- Technical English reading and comprehension skills.

CERTIFICATIONS: LPIC-1: Linux Administrator, AWS Cloud Practitioner, CCSP (Certified Cloud Security Professional).

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: January 6, 2025.
- Duration: Approximately 10 months.
- Schedule: Mondays and Wednesdays, 17:30 - 21:30, and Fridays, 09:00 - 13:00.
- Academic Hours: 350 hours of frontal instruction.

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Location: School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, Bar-Ilan University Campus, Ramat Gan.
- Some classes may be conducted via Zoom, depending on university and national guidelines.
- Includes hands-on projects, practical exercises, and real-world scenarios.

TUITION AND FEES: 
- Registration Fee: 480₪.
- Tuition Fee: 15,800₪ (includes original ISC2 study materials at no additional cost).
- 20% discount voucher for AWS Solutions Architect Associate certification course.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- DOMAIN 1: Becoming a DevSecOps Expert (5 Hours): Introduction to DevSecOps, career development, and LinkedIn profile building.
- DOMAIN 2: Linux Administration and LPI LPIC-1 Exam Preparation (40 Hours): Covers Linux shell basics, system administration, file permissions, network management, and more.
- DOMAIN 3: Git and GitHub (10 Hours): Version control, branching, merging, and integration with IDEs.
- DOMAIN 4: Bash Scripting and Programming (30 Hours): Advanced Linux scripting, database integration, and programming fundamentals.
- DOMAIN 5: Python Programming (60 Hours): Python basics, OOP, web development, and DevOps-specific projects.
- DOMAIN 6: Virtualization and Containers (15 Hours): Docker usage, container lifecycle, and Docker Compose.
- DOMAIN 7: Kubernetes (30 Hours): K8s architecture, pod management, services, and Helm.
- DOMAIN 8: CI/CD Pipeline (25 Hours): Jenkins pipelines, GitHub/GitLab integration, and complete CI/CD workflows.
- DOMAIN 9: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner (40 Hours): AWS infrastructure, security, and compliance.
- DOMAIN 10: Infrastructure as Code - Terraform (15 Hours): Declarative approach, modules, and AWS-based usage.
- DOMAIN 11: Monitoring and Alerting Systems (25 Hours): ELK Stack, Grafana, and Prometheus.
- DOMAIN 12: ISC2 Cloud Security Professional - CCSP (45 Hours): Cloud security concepts, architecture, and compliance.
- DOMAIN 13: Final Projects Presentation (10 Hours): Real-world scenarios and comprehensive project presentations.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: 
- Contact Person: Esther Asulin.
- Email: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.
- Phone: *9392 (Information Center), 03-5318254 (Main Office).

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: 
- Bar-Ilan University, School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security.
- Official AWS Academy and ISC2 Authorized Training Partner.
- Address: Bar-Ilan University Campus, Ramat Gan, Israel.

ADDITIONAL NOTES: 
- Program opening is subject to a minimum number of registrants.
- Registration fees are non-refundable unless the program is canceled.
- The university reserves the right to make changes to the program structure, schedule, or content.
- Students must attend at least 80% of classes and complete all assignments to receive certification.

This comprehensive program equips students with the skills and certifications needed to excel in the fields of DevOps and DevSecOps, combining theoretical knowledge with practical application and industry-recognized credentials.
